name: 23rd World Congress on Advances in Gastroenterology and Hepatology
content: 23rd World Congress on Advances in Gastroenterology and Hepatology which is going to be held on June 23-24, 2021 as a Webinar/Virtual Conference. We cordially invite all the Gastroenterology and hepatology Professionals – Doctors, research fellows, students, speakers, delegates, exhibitors and sponsors to be a neighbourhood of great International event and to participate and explore more in the respective field. International Conference on Gastroenterology and hepatology aims for “covid 19 impacts on international gastroenterologists” is the main theme. Asian Gastro 2021 offers a cutting-edge program of renowned international speakers, specialist concurrent sessions, short paper and poster presentations attracting experts altogether in the varied fields of Gastroenterology. This webinar has been carefully designed to satisfy the unique educational needs of physicians and medical practitioners.
